name: Super Ransacker
description:
HTML version is really unstable right now. I recommend downloading the PC build for the best experience.

INSTRUCTIONS

Ransack the scene, to find the diamond. Once the diamond is found, repair the scene, and press the red button.

WASD - Move

MOUSE - Look

LEFT CLICK - Fire projectile

RIGHT CLICK - Drop projectile

E - Pickup/Interact

Q - Drop

R - Repair
